# Russell and Serban

 - What is the ‘Westminster model’?

 - Why do Russell and Serban criticise it as a concept?

 - Should we abandon the concept? Are there ways in which it could be useful?

# Caraway

 - What case does Morgan examine? What is this a case of?

 - How generalisable are the findings from this single case?

 - What evidence did Morgan use? How convincing is it?

 - How could the study have been improved? What other methods could have been used? Would a comparative case study have worked better?
